content: परिक्षीण {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Vanished, disappeared. {@--2@} Wasted, decayed. {@--3@} Emaciated, worn away, exhausted; <ls>Pt. 2. 70.</ls> {@--4@} Impoverished, entirely ruined; <ls>Bh. 2. 45.</ls> {@--5@} Lost, destroyed. {@--6@} Diminished, decreased; प्राण° <ls>Pt. 4. 23.</ls> {@--7@} (In law) Insolvent.
